  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/941</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/941</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Literatura: pícaros y pícaras</string>
            <string language="en">Literature: male and female rascals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur: männliche und weibliche Gauner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Littérature : rascals mâles et féminins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Literatura: rascals masculinos e fêmeas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Letteratura: rascals maschii e femminili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λογοτεχνία: αρσενικά και θηλυκά καθάρματα</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs interactiu sobre la novel·la picaresca en llengua castellana i en altres llengües. Textos d'"El Lazarillo", "El Buscón" i "La pícara Justina". Tipologia textual: s'estudia l'exposició. Hi ha activitats d'autoavaluació per a la pràctica dels continguts de la unitat.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource on the picaresque novel in Spanish and other languages. Texts from "Lazarillo de Tormes", "El Buscon" ("The Rogue") and "The Picara Justina". Type of text: exposition. Self-assessment activities are also included for practice.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">autobiografia</string>
            <string language="en">autobiography</string>
            <string language="es">autobiografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gènere literari</string>
            <string language="en">literary genre</string>
            <string language="es">género literario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">història de la literatura</string>
            <string language="en">literary history</string>
            <string language="es">historia de la literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">obra literària</string>
            <string language="en">literary work</string>
            <string language="es">obra literaria</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel auf dem picaresque Roman
in spanisch und in anderen Sprachen. Texte von "Lazarillo de 
Tormes", "EL Buscon" ("der Gauner") und "das Picara Justina". 
Typ des Textes: Ausstellung. Selbstbewertung 
Aktivitäten sind auch für Praxis eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource interactive sur le roman de picaresque 
dans l'Espagnol et d'autres langages. Textes de "Lazarillo de 
Tormes", "EL Buscon" ("l'Escroc") et "le Picara Justina". 
Type de texte : exposition. Des activités de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sont également incluses pour la pratique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso interativo na novela do picaresque no 
espanhol e nas outras línguas. Textos de "Lazarillo de Tormes",
"EL Buscon" ("o Rogue") e "o Picara Justina". Tipo de texto: 
exposição. As atividades do self-assessment são 
incluídas também para a prática.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa interattiva sul romanzo del picaresque 
nello Spagnolo ed in altri linguaggi. Testi "da Lazarillo de 
Tormes", "EL Buscon" ("il Rogue") e "il Picara Justina". Tipo di
testo: esposizione. Le attività di valutazione di se 
stesso egualmente sono incluse per pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς στο πικαρέσκ 
μυθιστόρημα στα ισπανικά και άλλες γλώσσες. Κείμενα από 
"Lazarillo de Tormes", "EL Buscon" ("ο απατεώνασ") και
"το Picara Justina". Τύπος κειμένου: έκθεση. 
Οι δραστηριότητες αυτοαξιολόγησης συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης 
για την πρακτική.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Autobiographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarisches Genre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarische Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">literarische Arbeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">autobiographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">genre littéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">histoire littéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">travail littéraire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">autobiography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">genre literário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">history literário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trabalho literário</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">autobiography</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">genere letterario</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia letteraria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνικό έργο</string>
          </keyword>
